message: Hi Bob, how are you?
Hey Alice, I'm good. How about you?
I'm doing well too, thanks for asking.
That's great to hear. Anything interesting happen lately?
Not really, just been busy with work. How about you?
Same here, work has been keeping me busy too.
By the way, I took this photo on my trip to Hawaii last week. Thought you might like to see it!
Wow, that looks amazing! I've always wanted to go to Hawaii.
Hi, how are you doing today?
Hey Jane, I'm doing pretty good, thanks for asking. How about you?
I'm doing alright, thanks for asking. Just a little tired from work. How's your day going?
It's going pretty well, just trying to stay on top of my to-do list. Did you hear back from the client yet?
Not yet, but I'm hoping to hear back from them soon. I really want to close this deal.
Yeah, it would be a big win for us if we can land that client. Have you tried following up with them?
I sent them an email yesterday, but I haven't heard back yet. I'll give them a call later today if I still haven't heard back.
Sounds like a plan. Let me know if there's anything I can do to help.
Thanks, I appreciate it. I'll keep you updated.
No problem. Hey, did you catch the game last night?
No, I didn't. Who won?
The Lakers beat the Celtics by 10 points. It was a pretty good game.
